name: bztitanium
title: Titanium
author: Brevven
description:
Adds titanium to the base game.

Titanium is used in Low Density Structures, Flying Robot Frames and a few other places.

Compatible with Krastorio 2, Space Exploration, Aircraft, 5Dim's, FE+ and other mods. A standalone piece of BZ Mods.

With graphics by snouz.
